column4: would hardy or intrepid 64 be better suited for a core i7 system with a nvidia gtx 260 gfx card and 6GB ddr3?
you need 64 bits to access all the memory
I'm aware of that :P maybe I didn't make myself clear.. the decission was between hardy and intrepid, both 64 bit
as onetinsoldier said it is pretty new hardware so intrepid may be a better fit
